text: Dr Joshua is very patient and nice, and my teeth now is super align, thanks to him. He is very thoughtful for his patient and I would really recommend to come here for treatment. Thanks for all the staff in norfrills  too throughout my journey, will come back again and recommend to others ;)

Very transparent and patient dentist. Admin/Receptionist are also very responsive on WhatsApp which makes making appointments very pleasant.

I still come back for my routine scaling and polishing even though I no longer work around here.

*Long review ahead*

Visit with caution.
I believe there are other better clinics.
The only good point is that my dentist is really gentle and patient.

I wished the entire experience was pleasant.

I started my Zenyum journey with the clinic on 1 Oct 2023 - 12 March 2025.
18 MONTHS.

At the beginning of my treatment, I am told both by Zenyum and the clinic that my case is mild and as promised on their multiple platforms it should take around 3 months +/-. But it took 18 months.

Even for complex cases it “may require up to 15 months” but my mild case (not complex) took 18 months.

In order for the teeth to move, the dentist had to file between tooth to create spaces for them to move and those spaces were unable to close up during the treatments. As per attached photos, after the treatment I needed 5 refinements.

Today I visited the clinic for my end review for my 5th refinement to find out there were still 1 more gap they were unable to close. Under frustration, I gave up hope closing it and decided not to proceed with SIXTH refinements.

Mind you, for every refinements, the clinic needed to take a 3D scans of the teeth at your own cost $110+.
If I remembered correctly, I paid for the scans up till the 3rd refinements, the rest were covered either by the clinic/Zenyum.
I got frustrated with the treatment and felt I should have to pay for their mistake because they couldn’t close the gap they opened.
Every refinement is supposed to close all the gaps, even after the 5th refinement I still have to live with 1 gap forever.

To add on, at my visit today, I have to do fillings.
As per attached photo, the clinic told me it is priced at $150/tooth. At the clinic, the dentist showed me the 4 fillings he did. 2 on 1 tooth, and on 2 other teeth. Doesn’t that make 3 teeth?
They charged me for 4 teeth because 1 tooth had 2 fillings.

It’s very misleading.
I hope they were more transparent about it.

When I told the receptionist about it, she said I still have to pay this price so she will just amend the invoice. I was shocked because I thought she meant to fabricate the description just to include the cost.

Almost every trip, all the receptionists have really bad service. They should not work in customer service industry.

Overall I had a bad experience and just want this whole ordeal to end.

Dr Joshua Chong is very professional but the service level of the reception desk is exceptionally bad. I bought a set of toothpaste & brush , however  she didn’t check the goods and the toothbrush was missing from the set. I went back and checked, her nonchalant reply was “nah, you can have this set”, with no apologies for her mistake. Please send your front desk for basic customer service , the bad English and lack of proper reply left a bad experience to an otherwise pleasant trip

Smooth procedure and kind service all around. The dentist was very clear in explaining the procedure and elaborating about what steps my son could take in the future. An overall very pleasant experience
